question: What is the difference between Navigator.push() and Navigator.pushReplacement()?
answers: Navigator.push() adds a new screen on top, while Navigator.pushReplacement() replaces the current screen
Navigator.push() removes the current screen, while Navigator.pushReplacement() does not
Navigator.push() works with stateless widgets only
correct_answer: Navigator.push() adds a new screen on top, while Navigator.pushReplacement() replaces the current screen
